title: Enumerate Ms Edge History using a C# program or just dump to a logfile
body:
I need to be able to process the details of the web pages displayed by Ms Edge (you can for all other browsers) Either a direct program call from C# of the ability to dump the details to a log file.
This tool? would also permit the examination of what pages were read 30+ days ago

comments.body: If you have a crash, zip/rar the crash minidump file, and use "attach file" on your forum post. This will help us debug the problem much more easily. The minidump file location is included in the crash report log -- please include the minidump file if you have a crash.
